dtliExcerpt: Daniel Fish's radical reimagining of the Rodgers and Hammerstein classic is a thrilling, unsettling experience that feels utterly contemporary.
bwwExcerpt: Director Daniel Fish's bold, spare revival of Oklahoma! gives us the ranch but not the dressing. The musical's cast of 12 performs in modern clothing, mostly without microphones, with the audience seated on either side of the minimal stage.
